definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Constitution is the national fundamental law, with supreme status.
sentences.chinese: 宪法是国家的根本法，具有至高无上的地位。

sentences.english: I pray that all will gain unsurpassed Enlightenment.
sentences.chinese: 我祈祷所有的生命获得无上正等正觉。

sentences.english: The Seal, solid in configuration, is simple and honest, majestic and supreme.
sentences.chinese: 印章构型稳固，古朴敦厚，大气浑然，至尊无上。

sentences.english: Humans are sovereign beings by virtue of their indwelling adjusters.
sentences.chinese: 人的总称凭借他们的内涵调节器，是至高无上的存在。

sentences.english: However, such provisions are of evidentiary value insofar as they bear upon questions of custom and practice.
sentences.chinese: 但是，此条款具有习惯与实务上无上的价值。

sentences.english: Like the pulsing life of the neighbourhood, like buds, determined to bloom, like the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 就像那至高无上的生命的近邻，像蓓蕾取决于绽放。

sentences.english: They should bring forth The Supreme Bodhi Mind.
Theoretically, the monarch embodies supremacy as head of state. P130
sentences.chinese: 理论上，君主如同国家元首般享有至高无上的权力。

sentences.english: I will maintain the utmost respect for human life, from the time of conception.
sentences.chinese: 对人类自其生命受胎之时始，就给予至高无上的尊重。

sentences.english: The high point of the pilgrimage circuit is Kim Il Sung's mausoleum.
sentences.chinese: 金日成陵墓是至高无上的这么一个地方。

sentences.english: Enclosed is the king of supreme pizza, it is all vajrayana of honour.
sentences.chinese: 金刚萨垛是至高无上的，是金刚乘一切坛城之尊。

sentences.english: In the capitalistic market economy the consumers are supreme.
sentences.chinese: 在资本主义市场经济中，消费者是至高无上的。

sentences.english: Living in this era, we feel proud to follow this trend.
sentences.chinese: 我们作为这个潮流里的一成员，感到无上光荣。

sentences.english: So let me simply add that it's my very good honor to meet you…
sentences.chinese: 所以让我简单地再加上一句，无上光荣地遇见您。

sentences.english: The French Revolution is the consecration of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 法兰西革命是人类无上的光荣。

sentences.english: When chanting it, the supreme energy manifests everywhere around us.
sentences.chinese: 当唱诵时，这至高无上的能量会在我们周遭各处显现。

definition: the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
